key.name: database-provider
key.description: GNOME Data Access provider to use for the database. Usually SQLite or SQLCipher.

key.name: toolbar-visible
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be visible.

key.name: statusbar-visible
key.description: Whether the statusbar should be visible.

key.name: employee-log-in
key.description: Whether employees are allowed to log in to record time in and out.

key.name: padding
key.description: The padding used for tables and lines in reports, in pixels.

key.name: title-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the title of the report.

key.name: company-name-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the company name in the report.

key.name: header-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the headers of tables in the report.

key.name: text-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for texts in the report.

key.name: number-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for numbers in the report.

key.name: emphasized-number-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for emphasized numbers in the report. These are usually used in columns for total.

key.name: approver-position
key.description: The company position of the approver.
